Question: By the time this person was an established movie actress in the mid-1930s, they were no longer a couple.
Hints: This person's parents married on January 18, 1889, in Brooklyn and reared their children as Protestant.
Directed by Henry Hathaway, Go ****, Young Man is considered one of this person's weaker films of the era.
By some accounts this person's mother was of partial Jewish descent.
